The battle ended prematurely as Ellena received a phone call and had to leave. Serena later saw Aria on TV and realized that Ellena was Aria. Aria and Serena were matched up in the Kalos Queen final round. Aria`s Vivillon was revealed at the beginning of the performance and it lifted Aria up in the air to make it look like she was flying. The performance was enough for Aria and her Pokémon to defend their title and retain the title of Kalos Queen by defeating Serena.

character.name: Fokko (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Fennekin is an Idol Pokémon who is regularly featured in the "Best 10 PokéVisions (ポケビジョン・ベスト10)" and it started off in idol Pokémon unit with Elle and they are now immensely popular. Ash Ketchum thought that Elle`s Fennekin was cute. While on their way to Shoyo City, Ash Ketchum and his friends stopped at a Pokémon Center and watched PokéVision. The episode they watched featured Elle`s "Idol Life" (アイドルライフ) which was that week`s number one video.

character.name: Alan
character.description: Alan is a Trainer who travels around to "master Mega Evolution and stand on the top as the strongest". Although he studied Mega Evolution with Professor Sycamore once and was the professor`s assistant, the two parted way. While traveling through a forest in Kalos region, he encountered Ayaka in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and after a fierce battle he ended up winning the fight. Watching the battle was Manon who quickly became attached to Alan as she had some questions for him to answer and soon after became his `traveling companion`. Nurse Joy told Alan that Siebold of the Kalos Region Elite Four had a restaurant nearby, so Alan went to challenge him. When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan held his own for most of the battle until he finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan as he was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage. He complemented him on an excellent battle as it had been a while since he "last had fresh meat with a backbone".

character.name: Louden
character.description: Louden is the director of the Kojin Town aquarium. He knows everything about the area and has plenty of interesting stories to tell people that visit. He told this story about the reason for the Gold Koiking statue: Long ago, free-dive fishing was popular in this area. Once, a fisherman was attacked with electricity by a Starmie while freediving and came on the verge of drowning. But just then, a huge, golden Koiking brought the fisherman to the shore, saving his life. Not only that, but there are occasionally some reports of the golden Koiking being seen. When Louden told the mayor about it, that meddler went right ahead and had that statue built at the aquarium. Louden`s dream is to bring the real golden Koiking to the aquarium and show it to children from all around the country. He spends many hours a day fishing to try to get the golden Koiking. On the evening Ash Ketchum and his friends were leaving, they saw the golden Koiking, finally confirming its existence. Louden told them he`d be sure to get the golden Koiking by their next visit to the aquarium.

character.name: Udeppou (Louden)
character.description: Louden`s Clauncher is Louden`s main partner. Udeppou is not very friendly. Louden originally planned to have it entertain the guests at the aquarium but Louden`s Clauncher seems to hate being watched by people. It lost its appetite and in the twinkling of an eye, became lethargic, so Louden decided to made it his Pokémon. When Rocket Gang tried to steal Clemont`s Dedenne, it fought to save it. It may not be a friendly Pokémon, but it has a strong sense of justice.

character.name: Koujin Town no Shichou
character.description: The Ambrette Town Mayor told Ash Ketchum and his friends about the bay and how it is inhabited by Koiking. He was the one responsible for getting a large golden Koiking statue placed at the aquarium.

character.name: Takeda
character.description: Takeda is a research worker that works at the very famous Fossil Laboratory in Kojin Town. Alexa requested an interview with him as the laboratories excavation group discovered Amarus and Amaruruga inside a glacier up in the north. Takeda greeted Alexa and Ash Ketchum and his friends and gave them a tour of the laboratory. When Rocket Gang stole the Amarus from the laboratory, he followed in a large truck and helped rescue it.

character.name: Chigoras (Zakuro)
character.description: Grant`s Tyrunt was the second Pokémon that Ash Ketchum faced in his Gym Battle against Grant. Ash Ketchum noted after consulting his dex that he and his Pokémon would have to be careful of that huge mouth and those fangs that Grant`s Tyrunt has. Bonnie also commented that Grant`s Tyrunt looked like a formidable opponent right from the start. Ash`s Froakie was the first to face Grant`s Tyrunt having defeated Grant`s Onix. Ash Ketchum underestimated Tyrunt and Draco Meteor ended up knocking out Ash`s Froakie. Ash`s Fletchling was the next Pokémon sent out to fact it but it was also quickly overpowered and knocked out of the air with Dragon Tail. The final matchup was Grant`s Tyrunt vs Pikachu and Grant thought Ash Ketchum was bold for using an Electric type against Tyrunt as it is both a Rock and a Dragon type and had an overwhelming advantage. Pikachu used a move Ash Ketchum called Draco Meteor Tomb where it was able to deflect the attack with Iron Tail. After using Rock Tomb, Pikachu was able to deflect one of the rocks into Tyrunt`s mouth and finish it off with Thunderbolt.

character.name: Monarque
character.description: Monarque is a world famous Pofflé Master who was the chief juror at a Pofflé Contest that Serena participated in near Shoyo City. She explained that Pofflés are sweets which are filled with the wishes for humans and Pokémon to get along well. She told the crowd and participants that excellent Pofflés may deepen the bond between Pokémon and people even further.

character.name: Millefeui
character.description: Miette is a Pofflés Chef that participated in a Pofflés Contest in a town near Shoyo City which she specifically came to and competed against Serena. She could see that Serena liked Ash Ketchum and she wondered if he had a future bride. Ash Ketchum confused by the question stated he didn`t which left the door open for Miette to distract Serena in the contest. After they couldn`t find any berries for the second round to use as ingredients for their Pofflés, Miette and Serena decided to work together to find some until they managed to find some and defeated Rocket Gang who had been taking them. After loosing the Pofflés Contest, she said she would continue her journey and keep studying Pofflé making. She also told Serena that if she continued to keep her head in the clouds, she`d steal Ash Ketchum away. The two shook hands and parted ways. She also participated in the Tripokalon in Fujo Town where Serena was also a competitor. Beforehand she told her that she`d settle her score with her and might make a move on Ash Ketchum, too. She won the Pofflé round and advanced to the performance round but ended up loosing to Serena who managed to get the most votes. Despite loosing that day, Miette vowed to win next time and that she hadn`t given up on her competition of gaining Ash Ketchum`s affection either.

character.name: Peroream (Millefeui)
character.description: Millefeui`s Slurpuff was first seen when it ate the Pofflé that Serena had made. It thought her Pofflé was so-so. Peroream can pick up sweet scents, so it`s good at finding Berries. It was instrumental in helping Millefeui find some berries for the final round of the Pofflés Contest. Since Peroream is the evolved form of Peroppuff, it could understand the feelings of the Peroppuff very well that were angry after Rocket Gang had disrupted their food source.

character.name: Poffle Contest no Announcer
character.description: The Pofflé Contest Announcer is the announcer at the Pofflé Contest.

character.name: Toraya Kyoudai
character.description: The Toraya Siblings participated in the Pofflés Contest near Shoyo City that Serena and Millefeui were also in. They ended up winning the contest with their Mugwort Dumpling Pofflé which Monarque noted had a Japanese taste and it created a novel style: Solace! Their individual names were not revealed in the Japanese version of the anime.

character.name: Makunoshita (Toraya Kyoudai)
character.description: The Toraya Siblings` Makuhita was seen cheering when it was announced that they made it to the finals. It also appeared on stage when they one the contest. It is unknown what its role was or what moves it knows.

character.name: Grey
character.description: Grey lives together with his wife Hannah and Flabebe near Ebine Town. His wife recently fell ill and was admitted to the Central Hospital of Ebine Town. He was told that Hannah had to be hospitalized for a while. The next morning when he woke up, Flabebe was gone. He had a hunch and went to the hospital Hannah was staying in and he found Flabebe in the rain, watching Hannah with a worried expression. It got startled and dropped its flower which was crushed by a passing vehicle and a strong gust of wind blew Flabebe away. He been looking for Flabebe the whole time and was finally been reunited when he saw it resting on Bonnie`s hair. He went to stay with his wife at the hospital after Ash Ketchum and friends said they`d look for a Fairy Flower for him. Grey and Hannah were both thankful that they were able to get the flower and both Hannah and Flabebe were on the road to recovery.

character.name: Hannah
character.description: Hannah lives together with her husband Grey and Flabebe near Ebine Town. She recently fell ill and was admitted to the Central Hospital of Ebine Town. She was told that she had to be hospitalized for a while. Hannah cherishes Flabebe a lot. When she went to the hospital, it went to see her and Grey found Flabebe in the rain, watching Hannah with a worried expression. Blabebe got startled and dropped its flower which was crushed by a passing vehicle and a strong gust of wind blew Flabebe away. Grey had been looking for Flabebe the whole time and was finally been reunited when he saw it resting on Bonnie`s hair. Grey went to stay with his wife at the hospital after Ash Ketchum and friends said they`d look for a Fairy Flower for him. Grey and Hannah were both thankful that they were able to get the flower and both Hannah and Flabebe were on the road to recovery.

character.name: Flabebe (Grey)
character.description: Grey`s Flabébé lives together with Grey and Hannah near Ebine Town. Bonnie asked Flabebe if Grey was its trainer and it nodded. Hannah recently fell ill and was admitted to the Central Hospital of Ebine Town. They were told that Hannah had to be hospitalized for a while. The next morning when Grey woke up, Flabebe was gone. He had a hunch and went to the hospital Hannah was staying in and he found Flabebe in the rain, watching Hannah with a worried expression. It got startled and dropped its flower which was crushed by a passing vehicle and a strong gust of wind blew Flabebe away. He been looking for Flabebe the whole time and was finally been reunited when he saw it resting on Bonnie`s hair. It had been wondering around looking for a Fairy Flower and thought that the ribbon in Bonnie`s hair looked like that flower. A Flabebe that doesn`t have a flower will gradually lose its energy. Grey went to stay with his wife at the hospital after Ash Ketchum and friends said they`d look for a Fairy Flower for him. They first went to the local Pokémon Center to recover Flabebe`s health. Nurse Joy (Kalos) explained that Fairy Flowers should be blooming in the high plains near the town but their blooming season was nearing its end. Grey and Hannah were both thankful that they were able to get the flower for Flabebe and both Hannah and Flabebe were on the road to recovery.

character.name: Carne
character.description: Diantha is the strongest Pokémon Trainer in the Kalos region and is also the Champion of the Elite Four. As a famous actress, she is know for her elegant, full of mature composure and according to Serena, she is just the perfect woman in every aspect. Her character is based off of the real world actress Audrey Hepburn. Her movie "My Sweet Lady" (マイスイーツ・レディ) was the current blockbuster when Ash Ketchum was in the Kalos region. The movie title is a nod to the Audrey Hepburn movie My Fair Lady. Serena considers Diantha to be her idol. Professor Sycamore has been trying to get Diantha`s Key Stone so he can study it but she has respectfully declined his requests on numerous occasions. While doing location shooting in a region, Diantha makes sure she tries the sweets that are famous there, no matter how busy she is. When Serena got the last gâteau au chocolat slice, she decided to share it with Diantha who was in disguise. She usually declines private matches with Trainers, but since Ash Ketchum and his friends shared the cake with her, she made an exception and battled against him. The match was left undecided as it was interrupted by Rocket Gang. Ash Ketchum vowed to battle her again when he won the Kalos League.

character.name: Sirknight (Carne)
character.description: Diantha`s Gardevoir is Diantha main partner. The two share a close bond and are able to communicate during battles without speaking. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir during battle. While at the Guipna Highlands for a shooting a movie, a thick fog arrived and Diantha got lost in it. Diantha`s Gardevoir apparently came out of the monster ball she left with her manager and came looking for her, leading the way for everyone. During its exhibition match against Morgan`s Absol, it was quickly able to dodge all the moves and defeat it quite easily.

character.name: Morgan
character.description: Morgan is last year`s Vinegar Town exhibition match champion. He also resides in Vinegar Town in the Kalos region. He had an exhibition match against Diantha the day Ash Ketchum and his friends were in town. Despite being a champion in his own right, Diantha proved to be a superior Trainer and defeated him in the match.

character.name: Absol (Morgan)
character.description: Morgan`s Absol participated in the Vinegar Town exhibition match against Diantha`s Gardevoir. Despite being a strong and fast Pokémon and given the first move in the match, it was unable to land hits as Diantha`s Gardevoir avoided all its moves. It was swiftly defeated by Moonblast.

character.name: Minami
character.description: Minami is Diantha`s assistant. She organizes interviews and meetings and tries to keep her on schedule. She`s almost overprotective of Diantha and her attitude is quite stern and can get angry sometimes. Professor Sycamore seems to have encountered her before as he joked that she looks cute when she`s angry. When Rocket Gang stole Diantha`s Gardevoir, Minami showed up at the right time in a helicopter.

character.name: Corni
character.description: Korrina is the Gym Leader of the Shalour Gym in the Kalos region. She focuses on Fighting-type Pokémon and Trainers that defeat her receive the Rumble Badge.

character.name: Lucario (Corni)
character.description: Korrina`s Riolu had been together with Korrina since she was small. They played together every day, laughed, ate and sometimes they fought. They grew up like siblings. Korrina`s Riolu evolved into Korrina`s Lucario one day. Lucario and Korrina are soulmates. One day they met Ash Ketchum and Pikachu near Route 5 and they were their 99th straight battle. Korrina`s Lucario defeated Pikachu for their 99th victory and Korrina noted that Pikachu was a strong opponent. Rocket Gang noted that having a Lucario that could Mega Evolve and could defeat Pikachu was a Pokémon worth capturing. For a short time they managed to capture Korrina`s Lucario but Rocket Gang ended up being the 100th straight victory as they were sent off flying.

character.name: Riolu (Corni)
character.description: Korrina`s Riolu had been together with Korrina since she was small. They played together every day, laughed, ate and sometimes they fought. They grew up like siblings. Korrina`s Riolu evolved into Korrina`s Lucario one day. Lucario and Korrina are soulmates.

character.name: Concombre
character.description: Gurkinn is Korrina`s grandfather.

character.name: Kiyoshi
character.description: Kiyoshi is an young Trainer that lives in a town near Shala City. Rocket Gang dressed up as Ash Ketchum and his friends in order to discredit them. They forced a battle on Kiyoshi who didn`t want his Yancham to battle. He told them he`d report them to Officer Jenny. Later that day he met the real Ash Ketchum and his friends but realized they weren`t the people he`d confronted earlier in the day.

character.name: Yancham (Kiyoshi)
character.description: Kiyoshi`s Pancham lives with his trainer Kiyoshi in a town near Shala City. Rocket Gang dressed up as Ash Ketchum and his friends in order to discredit them. They forced a battle on Kiyoshi and Kiyoshi`s Pancham who didn`t want to battle. Kiyoshi`s Pancham was injured from the battle and Kiyoshi told them he`d report them to Officer Jenny. Since it doesn`t battle, none of its moves are known.

character.name: Makita
character.description: Makita runs a local photo studio in Sekitai Town. He met up with Korrina and Ash Ketchum and his friends and asked them if they wanted a souvenir photo as a memento of their journey. He told Korrina that the Evolutionary stones were available in caves deep within the mountains near the town but he said he didn`t know specifically about the location of a Lucarionite but he did tell her that he had heard there`s a cave where there is a special stone. He warned though that rumour states that if someone unqualified enters it, something terrifying will happen. Korrina believed that the stone was the Lucarionite and head off to find it. Upon returning to the town, she met up with Makita again and got a reprint of her picture which had burnt up in the battle to get the Lucarionite. Makita then revealed that her grandpa Gurkinn asked him to help him with the final trial to give her the Lucarionite.

character.name: Bursyamo (Concombre)
character.description: Gurkinn`s Blaziken was first seen in the Lucarionite cave and it was the final trial Korrina`s Lucario had to overcome in order to obtain the Lucarionite to Mega Evolve. Clemont noted in the battled that Gurkinn`s Blaziken moves very fast and is extremely strong. Despite knocking Lucario against the cave wall, Lucario was determined and it managed to fight back to the point that it had knocked Blaziken onto the ground and just as it was about to be knocked out, Gurkinn appeared and called the battle a win for Korrina`s Lucario. Gurkinn had never revealed to Korrina that he had a Blaziken and he always knew she would finish her training and come to the cave for the Lucarionite. Since Gurkinn was not commanding his Blaziken in the battle, the only move that can be confirmed is the Flamethrower that Ash Ketchum identified in the battle.

character.name: Luchabull (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Hawlucha was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan.

character.name: Maple
character.description: Maple lives in a house in the Must Mountains with her Kucheat. She often goes around collecting flowers in the meadows. Korrina was instructed by her grandpa Gurkinn to meet with Maple as she could help her with Lucario`s Mega Evolution issue. She instructed them to arrange flowers and then go out to collect them, day after day until they realized that working together, they`d link their hearts even stronger. By admiring views and arranging flowers, Maple believed it to be the most effective practice they could get. By having one heart and two views, they could tie the two views together and turn them into strength.

character.name: Kucheat (Maple)
character.description: Maple`s Mawile lives with Maple in the Must Mountains of the Kalos region. It can Mega Evolve during battles. It often watches the house when Maple goes out. It was targeted by Rocket Gang and briefly captured until it was rescued by Korrina`s Lucario. Korrina`s Lucario battled against Maple`s Mawile in a Mega Evolution battle, and it lost the battle to Kucheat as it couldn`t control its Wave at the time.

character.name: Kanazawa
character.description: Kanazawa taking care of the forest where Ash`s Hawlucha was the champion of near the Shala Gym and he had been acquainted with it for a long time. Kanazawa believed that it just came to the forest to test his skills. When Ash`s Hawlucha decided to leave the forest, Kanazawa gave it his blessing and hoped he would have even more passionate battles.

character.name: Hinoyakoma (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Fletchinder was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan. Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during a battle against Nami`s Talonflame. Evolving into Fletchinder Nami challenged Ash Ketchum to a sky battle and initially chose Ash`s Fletchling to battle her but Nami`s Talonflame thought it was too weak to battle against and wanted to battle Ash`s Hawlucha instead. Ash Ketchum made a deal with her that if Ash`s Hawlucha defeated her Fiarrow, that Ash`s Fletchling could battle it also. Nami ended up winning that match and Ash`s Hawlucha was defeated. Not long after though, Nami`s Talonflame was captured by Rocket Gang and with the assistance of Ash`s Fletchling, it was set free. Nami`s Talonflame wanted to battle Ash`s Fletchling after the events of Rocket Gang`s interference proved to it that Ash`s Fletchling was a strong opponent despite its initial impression. Nami`s Talonflame ended up being defeated after Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during the battle.

character.name: Nami
character.description: Nami is a Sky Trainer and instructor at Kalos Canyon near Shala City. She was first seen battling an opponent which according to her was really weak, so she began looking for a new opponent and noticed that Ash Ketchum had been watching her. She challenged Ash Ketchum to a sky battle and initially chose Ash`s Fletchling to battle her but her Fiarrow thought it was too weak to battle against and wanted to battle Ash`s Hawlucha instead. Ash Ketchum made a deal with her that if Ash`s Hawlucha defeated her Fiarrow, that Ash`s Fletchling could battle it also. Nami ended up winning that match and Ash`s Hawlucha was defeated. Not long after though, Nami`s Talonflame was captured by Rocket Gang and with the assistance of Ash`s Fletchling, it was set free. Nami`s Talonflame wanted to battle Ash`s Fletchling after the events of Rocket Gang`s interference proved to it that Ash`s Fletchling was a strong opponent despite its initial impression. Nami`s Talonflame ended up being defeated after Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during the battle.

character.name: Fiarrow (Nami)
character.description: Nami`s Talonflame trains at Kalos Canyon near Shala City. It was first seen battling an Airmd which according to Nami was really weak, so she began looking for a new opponent and noticed that Ash Ketchum had been watching her. She challenged Ash Ketchum to a sky battle and initially chose Ash`s Fletchling to battle her but her Fiarrow thought it was too weak to battle against and wanted to battle Ash`s Hawlucha instead. Ash Ketchum made a deal with her that if Ash`s Hawlucha defeated her Fiarrow, that Ash`s Fletchling could battle it also. Nami ended up winning that match and Ash`s Hawlucha was defeated. Not long after though, Nami`s Talonflame was captured by Rocket Gang and with the assistance of Ash`s Fletchling, it was set free. Nami`s Talonflame wanted to battle Ash`s Fletchling after the events of Rocket Gang`s interference proved to it that Ash`s Fletchling was a strong opponent despite its initial impression. Nami`s Talonflame ended up being defeated after Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during the battle.

character.name: Catherine
character.description: Madame Catherine is the Kalos Regions Pokémon Summer Camp custodian, who assists Professor Sycamore every time the run it. For that week, she was responsible for providing the participants with the greatest meals for which she hired Team Rocket as the chefs. She didn`t know that at the time of hiring but they actually proved to be "très bien chefs" and Team Rocket initially got her approval and a raise as their meals were popular with the kids.

character.name: Sana
character.description: Shauna is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. She along with Tierno and Trevor are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. Her dream is to become the world`s number one Pokémon Performer. Every time she enters a Pokémon Center, she checks out the newest PokéVisions. Whenever she gets a new Pokémon or obtains a cute ribbon or something, she gets the urge to make a new PokéVision video. Shauna watched Serena`s PokéVision video and she recognized her at the Pokémon Summer Camp. She kept telling Trevor there was this really cute girl in the video and showed him Serena`s PokéVision numerous times. Shauna took a liking to Serena`s Fennekin and seeing it in the flesh was a great experience for her.

character.name: Trova
character.description: Trevor is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. He along with Tierno and Shauna are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. He documents Pokémon he meets by taking pictures and his dream is to meet every Pokémon registered in the Zukan. He hopes he will discover unknown Pokémon that aren`t in the Zukan. Upon meeting Ash Ketchum, Trevor wanted to know if Ash Ketchum had seen a lot of Pokémon from Kanto which Trevor had not seen before.

character.name: Tierno
character.description: Tierno is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. He along with Trevor and Shauna are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. Tierno is from from Hakudan City and he gets crushes on girls easily according to Shauna (XY). His dream is to form a dance unit with my Pokémon. The rhythm and steps of a dance can be applied in battles as well which trainers often witness first hand in battles with him. On the first day of the Pokémon Summer Camp, he was put in to Team Zenigame. He battled against Ash Ketchum and won. Tierno hoped that this win was the first step to the camp`s Hall of Fame.

character.name: Zenigame (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Squirtle is Tierno`s starter Pokémon given to him by Professor Sycamore. It was first seen in the anime battling against a Roubushin which it showed off its dance moves and jumping power. During the first day of the Pokémon Summer Camp, it was matched up in a battle against Ash`s Froakie in a Water against Water battle. Its dodging rhythm made it too hard to hit and it ended up defeating Ash`s Froakie.

character.name: Fushigidane (Sana)
character.description: Shauna`s Bulbasaur is Shauna`s starter Pokémon given to her by Professor Sycamore. It was first seen in the anime when it was called out to be shown to Serena who thought it looked really cute. Shauna`s Bulbasaur is shy of strangers and a little unsociable. It won`t eat food unless Shauna`s the one giving it and it`s also not very expressive. It has starred in some of Shauna`s PokéVision videos. Despite its normal tendencies, it looks very cute when it runs and also its cry is cute. Serena`s Fennekin first official debut Pokémon battle was against Shauna`s Bulbasaur on the first day of the Pokémon Summer Camp. Despite the type advantage, it had a hard time in the battle. It was a fun battle and Serena made various discoveries while Shauna taught her a lot. The outcome of the battle was not revealed though.

character.name: Hitokage (Trova)
character.description: Trevor`s Charmander is Trevor`s starter Pokémon given to him by Professor Sycamore. It was first seen in the anime when it was running around shooting flames. Ash Ketchum noted it was very energetic. Shauna (XY) explained that is quick to pick up a fight and it`s always full of energy no matter the opponent. It particularly seemed fond of Clemont`s Chespin and it actually burned it with a flame. In the first day battles at the Pokémon Summer Camp, Trevor`s Charmander actually faced off against Clemont`s Chespin. The type disadvantage was still quite evident from their earlier encounter but the results of the battle were not disclosed.

character.name: Tairenar (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Fennekin evolved into Elle`s Braixen while changing from a PokéVision creator to a Pokémon Performer. It has quickly become a major player. Elle still regularly uploads PokéVisions though despite participating in the tournaments. At the time of the Pokémon Summer Camp, Elle held the title of "Kalos Queen" as she had won each tournament three or more times and had entered the Master Class. Elle`s Braixen was seen at the award ceremony with her.

character.name: Kojofu (Corni)
character.description: Korrina`s Mienfoo was the first Pokémon to face Ash Ketchum in his gym battle against Korrina. It was matched up against Ash`s Hawlucha. Kojofu`s movements were so precise that initially the rhythm dancing battling technique did not work very well against it. When Ash Ketchum finally realized that the rhythm strategy worked because it was Tierno who was using it and switched to their own rhythm that the battle changed. Ash`s Hawlucha was able to battle back and defeat Korrina`s Mienfoo.

character.name: Goriky (Corni)
character.description: Korrina`s Machoke was the second Pokémon to face Ash Ketchum in his gym battle against Korrina. It was matched up against Ash`s Fletchinder. During the battle Clemont noted that he couldn`t believe Korrina`s Machoke power. Ash`s Fletchinder was able to endure the attacks and ended up winning the match.

character.name: Yancham (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Pancham was the second Pokémon that Serena obtained.

character.name: Eddie
character.description: Eddie and his wife Lindsay are marine archaeology. They were scheduled to explore the Muraille Coast area of the ocean near Kojin Town when they encountered Ash Ketchum and his Badly Poisoned Pikachu. After healing Pikachu with an Antidote, they explained that they were planning to dive in that area of the ocean today to see if they could find a ship named "The Cussler" supposedly sunk there. Lindsay explained that they wanted to confirm The Cussler`s precise location and find out more about the sea currents that carried the ship there. Eddie stayed on the ship while his wife went down in the sub to explore the area. He made sure the video and audio feed from the sub was working correctly. He knew that the sea currents clashing in the area change at predetermined intervals and that the whirling currents would dissipate for a while. After his wife discovered a ship, he confirmed it was The Cussler by looking at the Milokaross emblem on the hull. The two archaeologists are now known for discovering what happened to The Cussler, where it precisely sunk as well as for pinpointing the sea currents deep within the ocean.

character.name: Lindsay
character.description: Lindsay and her husband Eddie are marine archaeology. They were scheduled to explore the Muraille Coast area of the ocean near Kojin Town when they encountered Ash Ketchum and his Badly Poisoned Pikachu. After healing Pikachu with an Antidote, they explained that they were planning to dive in that area of the ocean today to see if they could find a ship named "The Cussler" supposedly sunk there. Lindsay explained that they wanted to confirm The Cussler`s precise location and find out more about the sea currents that carried the ship there. Eddie stayed on the ship while his wife went down in the sub to explore the area. He made sure the video and audio feed from the sub was working correctly. He knew that the sea currents clashing in the area change at predetermined intervals and that the whirling currents would dissipate for a while. After his wife discovered a ship, he confirmed it was The Cussler by looking at the Milokaross emblem on the hull. The two archaeologists are now known for discovering what happened to The Cussler, where it precisely sunk as well as for pinpointing the sea currents deep within the ocean.

character.name: Ryuuji
character.description: Ryuji is traveling to study as a Pokémon Trainer. He resides in the Kalos region near Hiyoku City with his parents and brother Hajime. He hadn`t been home for a year when he noticed the nice smell of food that Clemont had prepared for lunch. His family used to have picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pokémon Trainer than him. His father set a challenge to whoever finds the treasure hidden on their family`s premises would become his heir. After encountering a Bakuong, Ryuji and Hajime worked together to defeat it. It ended up being their father`s, as he wanted his sons to remember the time when they worked together. Their closeness is their family`s treasure and he didn`t want them to ever forget that.

character.name: Hajime
character.description: Hajime is traveling to study as a Pokémon Trainer. He resides in the Kalos region near Hiyoku City with his parents and brother Ryuji. He encountered Bonnie in the forest with Clemont`s Chespin attempting to battle a Spear and he came to their rescue. His family used to have picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pokémon Trainer than him. His father set a challenge to whoever finds the treasure hidden on their family`s premises would become his heir. After encountering a Bakuong, Ryuji and Hajime worked together to defeat it. It ended up being their father`s, as he wanted his sons to remember the time when they worked together. Their closeness is their family`s treasure and he didn`t want them to ever forget that.

character.name: Nyaonix (Hajime)
character.description: Hajime`s Meowstic used to accompany the family to picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pokémon Trainer than him. Hajime`s Meowstic rescued Bonnie from a Spear and then teamed up to battle their father`s Bakuong.

character.name: Nyaonix (Ryuuji)
character.description: Ryuji`s Meowstic used to accompany the family to picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pokémon Trainer than him. Hajime`s Meowstic teamed up to battle their father`s Bakuong.

character.name: Nyasper (Ryuuji)
character.description: Ryuji`s Espurr used to accompany the family on picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji`s Espurr evolved into Ryuji`s Meowstic and none of its moves are confirmed as a Nyasper.

character.name: Nyasper (Hajime)
character.description: Hajime`s Espurr used to accompany the family on picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Hajime`s Espurr evolved into Hajime`s Meowstic and none of its moves are confirmed as a Nyasper.

character.name: Hajime to Ryuuji no Chichioya
character.description: Hajime and Ryuji`s Father resides in the Kalos region near Hiyoku City with his wife. His family used to have picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pokémon Trainer than him. Disappointed that his sons were fighting, he set a challenge that whoever found the treasure hidden on their family`s premises would become his heir. After encountering a Bakuong, Ryuji and Hajime worked together to defeat it. It ended up being their father`s, as he wanted his sons to remember the time when they worked together. Their closeness is their family`s treasure and he didn`t want them to ever forget that.

character.name: Hajime to Ryuuji no Okaasan
character.description: Hajime and Ryuji`s Mother resides in the Kalos region near Hiyoku City with her husband. She greeted her son`s and was glad to see they were safe. They didn`t come home and rarely called, so she was worried.

character.name: Bakuong (Hajime to Ryuuji no Chichioya)
character.description: Hajime and Ryuji`s Father`s Exploud was sent out to test Ryuji and Hajime and it was told to lie in wait for them in the forest. The two brother`s teamed up to battle it and it was their father`s hope that working together to battle Bakuong would remind them of previous battles they had together. The plan worked and through their battle with Bakuong they were reminded that closeness is their family`s treasure.

character.name: Monsieur Pierre
character.description: Monsieur Pierre was the host of the LaGoon Rookie Class Tripokalon Tournament. He introduced Mademoiselle Elle`s exhibition performance.

character.name: Kaori
character.description: Kaori is a Tripokalon performer from Matisse Town in the Kalos region. She was the first performer at the LaGoon Rookie Class Tripokalon Tournament but her performance was interrupted by Serena`s Pancham and she was unable to complete her routine.

character.name: Trimmien (Kaori)
character.description: Kaori`s Trimmien participated in the LaGoon Rookie Class Tripokalon Tournament. It`s performance was interrupted by Serena`s Pancham and it was unable to complete her routine.

character.name: Eclair
character.description: Miss Éclair is Clemont`s old teacher who he met up with as he was continuing his journey towards Hiyoku City with Ash Ketchum and friends. Clemont had told Éclair that he had a very cute baby sister and upon realizing that this was his teacher, Bonnie quickly asked her to marry Clemont. According to Clemont, Éclair is very kind and lovely. Éclair teaches at a school where the curriculum is very strict and it`s quite difficult to graduate without flunking at some point.

character.name: Kolink (Citron)
character.description: While taking a recreational stroll while struggling with his graduate research, Clemont encountered this Kolink in the park and quickly took it to Nurse Joy. It was quite weak so it took a while for it to recover but Nurse Joy made a suggestion that it would be nice if there was a place in the town where Electric Pokémon could freely absorb electric energy. This became Clemont`s project and he befriended Kolink. During his research and development stage for the Citronic Shower, Kolink often visited Clemont and tested the experiment. Upon graduation, Clemont was planning to ask Kolink to be his my partner and come with him to Miare. He even got a cake with blended just the right amount of sweetness for Kolink but Clemont was sidetracked by the Mayor of the town and he missed his meeting with Kolink.

character.name: Luxio (Citron)
character.description: While taking a recreational stroll while struggling with his graduate research, Clemont encountered a Kolink in the park and quickly took it to Nurse Joy. It was quite weak so it took a while for it to recover but Nurse Joy made a suggestion that it would be nice if there was a place in the town where Electric Pokémon could freely absorb electric energy. This became Clemont`s project and he befriended Kolink. During his research and development stage for the Citronic Shower, Kolink often visited Clemont and tested the experiment. Upon graduation, Clemont was planning to ask Kolink to be his my partner and come with him to Miare. He even got a cake with blended just the right amount of sweetness for Kolink but Clemont was sidetracked by the Mayor of the town and he missed his meeting with Kolink. When Clemont returned to the town where he went to school, the Kolink had evolved into a Luxio at some point and was living underground near the power generating area for the city. It was angry with Clemont for not meeting with it that day. Working together to stop Rocket Gang from stealing the town`s power restored a part of that friendship they built before and Luxio decided it would finally partner with Clemont.

character.name: Hina
character.description: Heidi is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. Heidi acts as the leader of the Laplace Defense Corps and they were afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Ken
character.description: Ken is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. Ken often gets words wrong when talking and if usually corrected by another person. The group was afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Joe
character.description: Joe is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. The group was afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy (Kalos) examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Lucario (Concombre)
character.description: Gurkinn`s Lucario can Mega Evolve into Mega Lucario. It tried to help Korrina`s Lucario learn how to control its rampaging in a Mega Evolution battle. Gurkinn`s Lucario knows its Wave thoroughly and during the battle against Korrina`s Lucario, the power of its Wave alone was enough to block attacks. The match didn`t last long as Gurkinn`s Lucario was far more experienced battling in its Mega form and knew how to use its Wave Guidance to assist it.

character.name: Metagross (Tsuwabuki Daigo)
character.description: Steven Stone`s Metagross can mega evolve into Mega Metagross. It was sent out to battle against Alan`s Charizard to which Manon noted it had the type disadvantage. The Mega Evolution battle was interrupted by Lysandre`s Pyroar before the match could be decided.

character.name: Nene
character.description: Nene is a Pokémon Tripokalon performer who was traveling through the Kalos region. While practicing for her performance with a Heartbreak theme, she encountered Serena and her friends and asked for their opinion on her performance. She was working hard to enter her first Tripokalon. She became a friend and rival of Serena`s. Serena suggested it might be good to synchronize Kamonegi`s and Muchul`s dancing more and Ash Ketchum suggested that she make the move Heart Stamp more flashy which she used midway through. Nene wrote the suggestions down and then wanted to see Serena`s performance and use it as a reference.

character.name: Kamonegi (Nene)
character.description: Nene`s Farfetch`d performs in Pokémon Tripokalon and was practicing when it got captured by Rocket Gang. It was able to use its stick to help determine which way they should go. It seems quite intelligent and sensible when it seemed a bit unsure of Nene`s decision to try and trade for Serena`s Pancham.

character.name: Muchul (Nene)
character.description: Nene`s Smoochum performs in Pokémon Tripokalon and was practicing when it got captured by Rocket Gang. It seemed to like Serena`s Pancham and the two of them did a dance together. Nene wanted to trade for Serena`s Pancham but she refused. Jessie tried to keep Nene`s Smoochum so she use it in her Tripokalon performances. Jessie noted that she she liked its lips.

character.name: Carl
character.description: Carl is the leader of a Super Pokémon Battle troupe. He and the troupe provide entertainment far beyond that of Pokémon battles as its the ultimate show, born out of an unprecedented fusion of Pokémon battles and drama. He orchestrates battles within a set story. He was the cornerman for his Luchablu who used to be the Champion of a tournament in the Kalos region where Fighting Pokémon compete against each other. Carl accidentally caused it to hurt its knee at a tournament and it can`t be involved in serious battles any more. Carl decided to come up with Super Pokémon Battles as a way for Dark Lucha to put on great shows and shine in them like never before.

character.name: Bulu (Carl)
character.description: Carl`s Snubbull is a member of the Super Pokémon Battles troupe. Ash Ketchum and Pikachu thought Luchabull was bullying it and came to rescue it. Unfortunately it was just doing a rehearsal and Carl`s Snubbull got mad and bit Ash Ketchum on the arm after it realized that Ellade got injured. None of its moves were confirmed in the episode although it did use a Bite like move on Ash Ketchum.

character.name: Ellade (Carl)
character.description: Carl`s Gallade is a member of the Super Pokémon Battles troupe. Ash Ketchum and Pikachu thought Luchabull was bullying Carl`s Snubbull and came to rescue it. Unfortunately it was just doing a rehearsal and Carl`s Snubbull got mad and bit Ash Ketchum on the arm after it realized that Ellade got injured. Nurse Joy (Kalos) bandaged up its leg and told it would take a few days to heal so it couldn`t perform during that time. None of its moves were confirmed in the episode.

character.name: Luchabull (Carl)
character.description: Carl`s Hawlucha is member of the Super Pokémon Battle troupe. It is part of the troupe that provides entertainment far beyond that of Pokémon battles as its the ultimate show, born out of an unprecedented fusion of Pokémon battles and drama. In the show it tries to Bulu as the story involves a bad guy named "Dark" and a hero called "Shining" settling a matter through a Pokémon battle. Luchablu used to be the Champion of a tournament in the Kalos region where Fighting Pokémon compete against each other and Carl was its cornerman. Carl accidentally caused it to hurt its knee at a tournament and it can`t be involved in serious battles any more. Carl decided to come up with Super Pokémon Battles as a way for Dark Lucha to put on great shows and shine in them like never before. Carl`s Hawlucha came to respect Ash`s Hawlucha after it took the place of Carl`s Gallade in the show temporarily while it was injured. The two initially didn`t get along because Ash`s Hawlucha was using real moves instead of acting but after some training and rehearsing, the two worked together to stop Rocket Gang from ruining the show.

character.name: Saizo
character.description: Saizo is a high-ranked ninja and the instructor assigned to Sanpei. He had a task for Sanpei and asked him to take a secret document containing ninja techniques that have been taught in their ninja village since olden times and deliver it to their allies. While Sanpei was attempting to complete his task, Saizo decided to test Sanpei to affirm how much he had grown on his journey. He dressed up as a masked ninja and attempted to steal the secret document. Sanpei though teamed up with Ash Ketchum and Saizo was impressed as he clearly saw that he communicated his thoughts as he faced many difficulties. After Sanpei safely finished the mission and Saizo revealed himself as the masked ninja, he told Sanpei that he would report back to their elder.

character.name: Gamenodes (Saizo)
character.description: Saizo`s Barbaracle battled against Sanpei and poisoned his Gekkouga after it was attempting to try to recover the document that was being transported as part of Sanpei`s testing. Saizo`s Barbaracle is one Saizo`s main Pokémon but Sanpei did not seem to recognize it.

character.name: Gekkouga (Sanpei)
character.description: Sanpei`s Greninja is the evolved form of Sanpei`s Frogadier. It evolved during the time that Sanpei first met Ash Ketchum and the time he was being tested by Saizo. Saizo had a task for Sanpei and Sanpei`s Greninja and he asked them to take a secret document containing ninja techniques that have been taught in their ninja village since olden times and deliver it to their allies. During a battle between Saizo`s Barbaracle, which at the time was the masked ninja`s Pokémon, Sanpei`s Greninja was poisoned. After Sanpei and Sanpei`s Greninja safely finished the mission and Saizo revealed himself as the masked ninja, he told Sanpei that he would report back to their elder about how well they performed together. Sanpei`s Greninja didn`t realize that masked ninja was Saizo and it had a very surprised look on its face when he was revealed.

character.name: Gekogashira (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Frogadier is the evolved form of Ash`s Froakie. It evolved during a battle with Saizo`s Barbaracle. As a result of evolving, it learned Aerial Ace. Bonnie was disappointed that she didn`t get to see it evolve and wanted it to turn back into a Froakie so she could see it evolve.

character.name: Numera (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Goomy was caught near Hiyoku City in the Kalos Region. It literally fell on Ash Ketchum`s head while he was walking in a rocky area after it dropped from the sky from the Swanna it had hitched a ride on. Ash`s Goomy is quick to take offense and as it is a Dragon Type Pokémon, it doesn`t like Fairy Type Pokémon like Clemont`s Dedenne. The habitat that Goomy was living in was invaded by a bunch of Pokémon and it escaped as a flock of Swanna fled the area. While on the Swanna, Ash`s Goomy got dehydrated. After consulting the dex, Ash Ketchum realized that Goomy like to live in damp, shady places, so its slimy body doesn`t dry out. It took Goomy to a nearby river to rehydrate. Team Rocket captured it and Pikachu but it was mainly Ash`s Goomy that allowed them to get away and fend them off. It made Pikachu`s fur coat slick enough to get through the cage and during Team Rocket`s attack, it Bided its time and sent the group flying away. Ash Ketchum realized that it wasn`t a weak Pokémon at all like the Dex said and he could feel its strong willpower. He asked it if it wanted to become as strong as Pikachu and to join him on his journey and it agreed to become part of the team.

character.name: Fukuji
character.description: Ramos is the gym leader of the Coumarine Gym and he gives trainers the Plant Badge for defeating him. He often drinks tea as a way to calm himself. He maintains the gym which is a very large tree. He weeds and prunes trees around his gym and sometimes asks visitors and challengers to assist him before their match like he did with Ash Ketchum. Despite struggling against Ramos`s Grass type Pokémon, Ash Ketchum managed to claim victory and get his fourth badge.

character.name: Watacco (Fukuji)
character.description: Ramos` Jumpluff was the first Pokémon revealed in the gym match against Ash Ketchum where it faced off against Ash`s Fletchinder. Ramos` Jumpluff had a huge disadvantage against Ash`s Fletchinder since it is a Flying and a Fire type as it is a Grass type. Despite the disadvantage, it had ways of defending itself in battle. Its Chlorophyll Ability raised its speed due to Sunny Day and was able to dodge many of the moves. It wasn`t until Ash`s Fletchinder used multiple Flame Charge`s that its speed caught up and was able to hit it and knock it out.

character.name: Utsudon (Fukuji)
character.description: Ramos` Weepinbell was the second Pokémon revealed in the gym match against Ash Ketchum where it faced off against Ash`s Fletchinder. Ash`s Fletchinder had just defeated Ramos` Jumpluff and Clemont thought that as long as Ramos continued to use Grass types, Ash`s Fletchinder would have a clear advantage. Ash Ketchum also thought that he would be able to defeat Ramos with just Ash`s Fletchinder but Ramos` Weepinbell showed it was a strong opponent. Ramos` Weepinbell was able to show it was fast as well but its combo of Poison Powder and Slam knocked out Ash`s Fletchinder and Ash`s Hawlucha before Ash`s Frogadier was able to defeat it.

character.name: Gogoat (Fukuji)
character.description: Ramos` Gogoat was the third and final Pokémon revealed in the gym match against Ash Ketchum where it faced off against Ash`s Frogadier in the last match up of the battle. Despite using a lot of healing moves, it proved to be an ineffective battle strategy against Ash`s Frogadier as Ash Ketchum observed calmly and carefully and a well timed Water Pulse was able to defeat Ramos` Gogoat. Ramos rides around his ranch on Gogoat. When Team Rocket was in the area, Ramos` Gogoat was used to stop their mecha.

character.name: Cleffy (Monsieur Pierre)
character.description: Monsieur Pierre`s Klefki was first seen during the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament where winners of the Rookie Class were awarded a Princess Key. It was holding on to the Princess Key around its keyring. After each theme performance, it would go to the door of each performer to unlock it.

character.name: Armelle
character.description: Armelle is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the first Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She was up against Shauna and Jessie but the audience did not vote enough for her, so Shauna advanced to the next stage and Armelle was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Trimmien (Armelle)
character.description: Armelle`s Furfrou participated in the first Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Armelle styled it to look like a Pharaoh Trim Furfrou for that round. It was up against Shauna`s Bulbasaur and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo but the audience did not vote enough for it, so Shauna advanced to the next stage and Armelle was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Blanche
character.description: Blanche is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She faced off against Serena and Clarice and advanced to the next round by defeating them with enough votes from the audience. Serena was eliminated from contention with this win by Blanche. In the final free performance round, a stage of originality created by a combination of performance and moves, she ended up loosing to Shauna.

character.name: Nyaonix (Blanche)
character.description: Blanche`s Meowstic participated in the free performances round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament which was a stage of originality. Unfortunately its performance wasn`t good enough as Shauna won the tournament.

character.name: Nyaonix (Blanche)
character.description: Blanche`s Meowstic participated in the theme performance and free performance rounds of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. In the theme performance round, it managed to get the most votes and Blanche advanced but eliminated Serena. It performed with Blanche`s Meowstic in the free performance round but unfortunately their performance wasn`t good enough as Shauna won the tournament.

character.name: Clarice
character.description: Clarice is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She faced off against Serena and Blanche but was eliminated from contention as Blanche won the round.

character.name: Yayakoma (Clarice)
character.description: Clarice`s Fletchling participated in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It faced off against Serena`s Fennekin and Blanche`s Meowstic♀ but was defeated as it did not get enough votes from the audience.

character.name: Flabebe (Sana)
character.description: Shauna`s Flabébé is an Orange Flower form Flabébé. It performed with Shauna`s Bulbasaur in the final free performance round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament which was a stage of originality created by a combination of performance and moves. It helped gain enough points with its performance that Shauna was able to win the tournament.

character.name: Yashio
character.description: Yashio returned to the Tripokalon world as a judge during the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Reporters were waiting for her at the venue but she did not make a statement. She watched the tournament from a private box but wasn`t impressed with any of the contestants and noted to her secretary that there wouldn`t be another girl like Elle but then she saw Serena crying on a nearby pier with her Pokémon.

character.name: Numail (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Sliggoo is the evolved form of Ash`s Goomy. It evolved during a battle against a wild Grumpig that was bullying a bunch of Spoink after Ash Ketchum tried to intervene in the battle to protect Goomy.

character.name: Rentorar (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Luxray is the evolved form of Clemont`s Luxio. It evolved at the Kalos Power Plant while it was under the control of Team Rocket and Clemont was trying to save it. It grew significantly during its evolving and Clemont had to hold onto it while it evolved fully. It learned to use Electric Terrain upon evolving which powers up Electric types and all the Pokémon in the plant fought back against Team Rocket.

character.name: Volt
character.description: Volt works at the Kalos Power Plant near Miare City. He is responsible for making sure that the plant The Kalos Power Plant directly generates solar power from space that is transmitted to earth via micro-waves and stored in the dam of a superconducting ring before being sent to Miare City. He and his coworkers were tricked by Rocket Gang into letting them into the plant and were subsequently tied up while Rocket Gang began modifying the plants antennae. He was rescued by Ash Ketchum and his friends and was able to make the electricity flow backward which caused an overload that stopped the radio waves that were affecting the Electric type Pokémon in the area. After helping stop Rocket Gang, he flew off to Miare City in a helecopter to report on the incident. Clemont came along with him.

character.name: Watt
character.description: Watt works at the Kalos Power Plant near Miare City. He is responsible for making sure that the plant The Kalos Power Plant directly generates solar power from space that is transmitted to earth via micro-waves and stored in the dam of a superconducting ring before being sent to Miare City. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions. He and his coworkers were tricked by Rocket Gang into letting them into the plant and were subsequently tied up while Rocket Gang began modifying the plants antennae. He was rescued by Ash Ketchum and his friends and was able to make the electricity flow backward which caused an overload that stopped the radio waves that were affecting the Electric type Pokémon in the area. After helping stop Rocket Gang, he and his coworkers thanked Ash Ketchum and friends for their assistance.

character.name: Ampere
character.description: Ampere works at the Kalos Power Plant near Miare City. He is responsible for making sure that the plant The Kalos Power Plant directly generates solar power from space that is transmitted to earth via micro-waves and stored in the dam of a superconducting ring before being sent to Miare City. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions. He and his coworkers were tricked by Rocket Gang into letting them into the plant and were subsequently tied up while Rocket Gang began modifying the plants antennae. He was rescued by Ash Ketchum and his friends and was able to make the electricity flow backward which caused an overload that stopped the radio waves that were affecting the Electric type Pokémon in the area. After helping stop Rocket Gang, he and his coworkers thanked Ash Ketchum and friends for their assistance.

character.name: Doctor White
character.description: Doctor White is a physician of humans and Pokémon who works at a village clinic in a rural area in the Kalos region near Miare City. He rescued Jessie and her Wobbuffet after they fell into the water after being exposed to Stun Spore by a Gloom. As a doctor, he visits people personally and does his rounds throughout the village. He is an amateur berry grower but he needs the Berries and medicinal plants for his patients, so he grows them outside his clinic. A local farmer provided him with some fertilizer for his plants after he cured his Diggersby. Jessie fell under the Florence Nightingale effect after she was rescued by Doctor White. She worked as his assistant for a little while and even contemplated marrying him until she found out that he liked his childhood friend Berry. After he thought that Berry might have been hurt by a Pokémon Hunter, he confessed his feeling for her.

character.name: Berry
character.description: Berry is a childhood friend of Doctor White who works at a lumber mill in the Kalos region near Miare City. She has a very independent and strong personality and doesn`t like it when people like Doctor White tell her she`s should seek assistance. She considers not standing up for herself as a sign of weakness. Doctor White went to visit Berry with Jessie to check on Berry`s Bidoof after a Pokémon Hunter had set up a trap and it was caught but managed to escape by crushing the iron bars with the teeth it`s so proud of. He diagnosed it with swollen gums and treated it. Berry wanted to make the Hunter pay if she ever found him but Doctor White told her to get Officer Jenny (Kalos). She took offense to that as she thought that he still looked at her as a child. Later after Doctor White thought that Berry might have been hurt by a Pokémon Hunter and when he realized that she was safe, he confessed his feeling for her which Jessie overheard and realized that he liked Berry instead of her.

character.name: Pokemon Hunter
character.description: Pokémon Hunter is jerk that was setting traps to catch Pokémon and whenever he finds rare Pokémon, he tries to sell them at a high price. He caught Clemont`s Dedenne and Berry`s Bidoof but both were able to escape. Berry was mad at the hunter and vowed to make him pay if she ever found him. He encounter Meowth and James and was able to defeat them and capture Meowth, James` Inkay and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo for a short time. He thought Meowth was the perfect prey because it could talk. James went to get help from Ash Ketchum and his friends and together they were able to defeat the Pokémon Hunter and tie him up until Officer Jenny arrived and arrested him.

character.name: Dosidon (Pokemon Hunter)
character.description: Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior is an extremely strong Pokémon that assists its master in capturing rare Pokémon to be sold on the market. It was sent out to battle Meowth and James and was able to defeat them and capture Meowth, James` Inkay and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo for a short time. James went to get help from Ash Ketchum and his friends and together they all joined up to battle Dosidon. Wobbuffet was instrumental in this battle by holding off Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior powerful attacks and striking a decisive blow with Mirror Coat to defeat the Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior who landed on the truck and destroyed it.

character.name: Bippa (Berry)
character.description: Berry`s Bidoof works at a lumber mill in the Kalos region near Miare City. Doctor White went to visit Berry with Jessie to check on Berry`s Bidoof after a Pokémon Hunter had set up a trap and it was caught but managed to escape by crushing the iron bars with the teeth it`s so proud of. He diagnosed it with swollen gums and treated it. None of its moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Mafoxy (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Delphox is the evolved form of Elle`s Braixen. It evolved sometime after its appearance at the award ceremony for the Kalos Queen title. It was revealed in a double battle against Serena`s Fennekin.

character.name: Tairenar (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Braixen is the evolved form of Serena`s Fennekin. It evolved during a double battle against Elle shortly before the battle was called off as Elle had to leave. Serena asked Tairenar to bear with her from now on after it evolved.

character.name: Frefuwan (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Aromatisse was revealed during a double battle with Elle`s Delphox against Serena. The battle was interrupted though by a phone call to Elle and ended in a no decision.

character.name: Shouta
character.description: Sawyer is a Pokémon Trainer that battled against Clemont in a Gym Battle at the Lumiose Gym. Only the end of the battle was shown where he was defeated by Clemont. He seems to be a beginning trainer as he was surprised how strong Gym Leaders were but was thankful for the Experience. He took notes from the battle for future reference. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions. His first appearance in the anime was in the third Japanese opening. In the original airing of the English dub of XY64, the closed captions listed his name as Scottie. In XY73, he is introduced as Sawyer. He was later seen attempting to challenge Valerie at the Laverre Gym but he unfortunately arrived on the day she was debuting her Furisode Collection and was told he couldn`t battle her that day. He reunited with Clemont who introduced him to Ash and company. While waiting for Serena and Bonnie to look at the clothes, Ash challenged Sawyer to a battle and the two decided on a Double Battle. Despite a type advantage, Ash`s battles are unpredictable because he negates type disadvantages like they are nothing and due to this and Sawyer lack of Double Battle experience, Ash easily won the match. He was grateful to battle though and gain the experience. As part of an established custom at Valerie`s cloth collection show debuts, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Sawyer and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Unfortunately for Sawyer, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her.

character.name: Kimori (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Treecko battled against Clemont`s Luxray at the Lumiose Gym. Only the end of the battle was shown where it was defeated by Clemont`s Luxray. Clemont explained that its Razor Leaf`s timing was just a moment too late and gave him the chance to counterattack. While waiting for Serena and Bonnie to look at the clothes at the Laverre Gym, Ash challenged Sawyer to a battle and the two decided on a Double Battle which featured Ash`s Frogadier and Ash`s Hawlucha VS Sawyer`s Bagon and Sawyer`s Treecko. Despite a type advantage, Ash`s battles are unpredictable because he negates type disadvantages like they are nothing and due to this and Sawyer`s lack of Double Battle experience, Ash easily won the match. He was grateful to battle though and gain the experience. Sawyer`s Grovyle is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Treecko. It evolved in a battle against Ash where it also learned Leaf Blade.

character.name: Numelgon (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Goodra is the evolved form of Ash`s Sliggoo. It evolved just after using Rain Dance to help put out the fire that was caused by Rocket Gang`s Automatic Pikachu Catcher exploded. The Rain Dance got heavier and was able to put out the fire. As a result of evolving, it also learned Dragon Pulse which it used to quickly blast Rocket Gang away. Shortly after the Rocket Gang battle, it had a double battle with Pikachu against Tierno. Ash`s Goodra`s Bide proved effective in the battle and the two of them were able to defeat Tierno.

character.name: Nyorotono (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Politoed is one of the new companions Tierno got after the summer camp ended. Tierno has taught it his rhythm strategy and dance moves.

character.name: Runpappa (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Ludicolo is one of the new companions Tierno got after the summer camp ended. Tierno has taught it his rhythm strategy and dance moves.

character.name: Raichuu (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Raichu is one of the new companions Tierno got after the summer camp ended. Tierno has taught it his rhythm strategy and dance moves. Tierno revealed it when he thought that since Ash Ketchum was going to challenge the Miare Gym, it might be better for him to train with an Electric type as his opponent. It was captured by Team Rocket and shocked the other Pokémon in the cage while attempting to escape. After escaping and reuniting Tierno, it participated in a double battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Goodra. It got knocked out by Dragon Pulse.

character.name: Kameil (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Wartortle is the evolved form of Tierno`s Squirtle. It evolved sometime after battling Clembot at the Miare Gym and before meeting Ash Ketchum in the forest for a training double battle. It was captured by Team Rocket but managed to escape and reunite with Tierno. During the training double battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Goodra, it got knocked out by Pikachu`s Thunderbolt.

character.name: Belmondo Kyouju
character.description: Professor Belmondo is a criminally insane Robotics professor and computer hacker. He hacked into Clemont computer and stole the blueprints for the Clembot. He then used those blueprints to make his own criminal robot. His plan was to frame the Clembot and then have Black Citroid solve the cases by capturing the Clembot as the culprit. It all backfired when he was confronted at the Miare Art Gallery and was defeated in a battle. He was arrested promptly by Officer Jenny (Kalos) after confessing his motives and plan during the battle.

character.name: Black Citroid
character.description: Black Citroid is a criminally programmed android created by Robotics professor and computer hacker Professor Belmondo. The professor hacked into Clemont computer and stole the blueprints for the Clembot. He then used those blueprints to make Black Citroid. The professor believed the Black Citroid was the greatest robot ever created as it was programmed to make sure that winning battles was the most important thing. Professor Belmondo`s plan was to frame the Clembot and then have Black Citroid solve the cases by capturing the Clembot as the culprit. It all backfired when he was confronted at the Miare Art Gallery and he and Black Citroid were defeated in a battle. Black Citroid was arrested along with Professor Belmondo promptly by Officer Jenny (Kalos) after the professor confessed his motives and plan during the battle.

character.name: Jibacoil (Belmondo Kyouju)
character.description: Professor Belmondo`s Magnezone was sent out to battle after Black Citroid was defeated in battle by Clembot. He forced it to battle hard and yelled at it if it was too slow or dawdling during the battle. Clemont studied Professor Belmondo battle style by observing the way the Black Citroid battled and Clemont`s Luxray was easily able to defeat Professor Belmondo`s Magnezone allowing Officer Jenny to arrest the professor.

character.name: Rarecoil (Belmondo Kyouju)
character.description: Professor Belmondo`s Magneton is used by Black Citroid for criminal activities as well as Pokémon Battles. It destroyed a lot of merchandise stored in a warehouse for the newest electric appliances. Later, it battled against Clembot and Clemont`s Heliolisk at the Miare Art Gallery. Black Citroid battle style was programmed to push its Pokémon hard to the point that the only thing that mattered was winning. Professor Belmondo`s Magneton lost the battle as according to Clemont, prioritizing partner Pokémon is what makes an excellent robot for Pokémon battles, not caring about them and pushing them past their limits.

character.name: Fukamaru (Platane-hakase)
character.description: Professor Sycamore`s Gible was brought to the lab by Alan to be healed after it rampaged through the city and got injured. After also rampaging through the lab, Professor Sycamore befriended the Gible and it stayed at the lab with him. While at the lab, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Gabite.

character.name: Gabite (Platane-hakase)
character.description: Professor Sycamore`s Gible was brought to the lab by Alan to be healed after it rampaged through the city and got injured. After also rampaging through the lab, Professor Sycamore befriended the Gible and it stayed at the lab with him. While at the lab, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Gabite. Little is known about Professor Sycamore`s Gabite other than it resided at the lab and played with the other Pokémon in the garden area. One day while in the garden, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp.

character.name: Kenzou
character.description: Kenzo works at a natural wetlands area in the Kalos region. He identified Ash`s Goodra as Ash`s Goomy, the Goomy that used to live in the wetlands. He explained to Ash Ketchum and his friends that Ash`s Goomy used to live in those wetlands in peace with its friends, but a disturbance occurred over a spring in the area that has a soothing effect on a Pokémon`s mind and body. Kenzo has a station in the wetlands which he maintains along with a boardwalk. He believe that humans should not interfere with wild Pokémon.

character.name: Madatsubomi (Kenzou)
character.description: Kenzo`s Bellsprout works at a natural wetlands area in the Kalos region with Kenzo. It was the first to identify Ash`s Goodra as Ash`s Goomy, the Goomy that used to live in the wetlands and pointed it out to Kenzo.

character.name: Corps
character.description: Corps is a dead person that lived in a house near Kunoe City. The house got a reputation in the area as being a Scary House because he liked to tell scary stories to his visitors. Corps invites travelers into his house and part of his welcoming services he provides a meal, accommodation and a fluffy towel to dry off. He likes to entertain his guests with a scary story, but Bonnie didn`t find them too scary. He befriended a Ghos, Ghost and Gangar when he was younger and they have also resided in the house. They are part of Corps welcoming services. Ash Ketchum and Bonnie found a notebook and a photo in the basement room which indicated that Corps was over 200 years old. Corps responded by telling them that he remembered that it was him in the picture and that he was actually dead. The photo was dated July 14th, 1758.

character.name: Maache
character.description: Valerie is the Gym Leader of Laverre City Gym and she specializes in Fairy-type Pokémon. Trainers that defeat her receive the Fairy Badge. Valerie is also a well known clothes designer and she showcases her designs at her company store which also doubles as the gym. In the Japanese version, Mâche speaks in a kyo-kotoba dialect, commonly known as the Kyoto dialect. While Ash Ketchum and company were visiting the gym, Valerie was showcasing her Furisode Collection which featured an elegant dress with a Marilli pattern and dresses with Florges and Lisyan patterns which were worn by Serena and Bonnie respectfully. The original models could not make it so Valerie asked them to model for her. As part of an established custom of her runway shows, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Scottie and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Unfortunately for Scottie, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her.

character.name: Tatsubay (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Bagon was revealed as Sawyer`s trump card in the Double Battle against Ash. While waiting for Serena and Bonnie to look at the clothes at the Laverre Gym, Ash challenged Sawyer to a battle and the two decided on a Double Battle which featured Ash`s Frogadier and Ash`s Hawlucha VS Sawyer`s Bagon and Sawyer`s Treecko. Despite a type advantage, Ash`s battles are unpredictable because he negates type disadvantages like they are nothing and due to this and Sawyer lack of Double Battle experience, Ash easily won the match.
