He was grateful to battle though and gain the experience. As part of an established custom at Valerie`s cloth collection show debuts, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Sawyer and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Sawyer`s Bagon was sent out to battle against Valerie`s Spritzee. Unfortunately for Sawyer, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her. Sawyer`s Shelgon was briefly seen battling against Ash`s Hawlucha in the first match-up of a 3-on-3 batle and was defeated by its Flying Press. It is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Bagon.

character.name: Shushup (Maache)
character.description: As part of an established custom at Valerie`s cloth collection show debuts, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Scottie and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Scottie`s Bagon was sent out to battle against Valerie`s Spritzee. Unfortunately for Scottie, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her. After Valerie`s Sylveon was defeated, Valerie`s Spritzee was matched up against Ash`s Fletchinder. The match was dominated by Valerie`s Spritzee Trick Room. Ash Ketchum kept instructing Fletchinder to use Flame Charge despite being under Trick Room`s effects which actually has the opposite effect and lowers its speed. Ash`s Fletchinder kept enduring attacks until the effects of Trick Room had warn off and he hoped that he could settle the match in one go but unfortunately the strategy didn`t pay off as Valerie`s Spritzee endured the Giga Impact and Steel Wing and knocked out Fletchinder with a Moon Blast. In the final match up, Ash`s Hawlucha was sent out to face a weakened Spritzee. Once again Trick Room dominated the match-up but Ash`s Hawlucha had learned a new move, X-Scissor which was able to shatter Trick Room and its effects on the playing field. Valerie was surprised and it wasn`t much later that Ash`s Hawlucha took over the match and knocked out Valerie`s Spritzee with a powerful High Jump Kick.

character.name: Kucheat (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Mawile attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection.

character.name: Barrierd (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Mr. Mime attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection.

character.name: Nymphia (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Sylveon attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection. During the Gym battle against Ash Ketchum, it faced off against Ash`s Fletchinder in the first match up. Valerie talked to her Sylveon in Pokémon language and it was able to more or less understand what she wanted to do. Valerie`s Sylveon being a Fairy type is delicate but strong. It used its tail ribbons to its advantage during the battle to capture Ash`s Fletchinder from moving about but he countered that but charging right into Sylveon with Flame Charge. The battle came to a climax when the two charged at each other with Giga Impact and Steel Wing but Ash`s Fletchinder came out victorious and knocked out Valerie`s Sylveon to win the first match-up.

character.name: Kirika
character.description: Kali is one of Valerie`s assistants who helps organize the Clothing Collection line showcase events. She announced each of the dress patterns as they were displayed by the models on the runway for the Designer Mâche`s Furisode Collection. She also was the judge in the Gym Battle between Valerie and Scottie.

character.name: Karen
character.description: Katherine is one of Valerie`s assistants who helps organize the Clothing Collection line showcase events. She spotted Bonnie and Serena and brought them to Valerie to see if she thought they would be good models for the Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Designer Mâche`s Furisode Collection.

character.name: Shione
character.description: Blossom is one of Valerie`s assistants who helps organize the Clothing Collection line showcase events. She agreed with Katherine who spotted Bonnie and Serena and brought them to Valerie to see if she thought they would be good models for the Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Designer Mâche`s Furisode Collection.

character.name: Asami
character.description: Linnea is one of Valerie`s assistants who helps organize the Clothing Collection line showcase events. She was running the front desk when Scottie was attempting to setup a time to have a Gym Battle with Valerie. Linnea explained to him that he`d have to come back the next day as Valerie wasn`t accepting any matches that day because of the event.

character.name: Juptile (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Grovyle is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Treecko. It evolved in a battle against Ash where it also learned Leaf Blade. Despite evolving, learning a new move and becoming stronger, it couldn`t overcome the EXP that Ash`s Frogadier had and was quickly knocked out with a blast from Water Pulse. Sawyer vowed to Juptile that they should become stronger. Sawyer`s Grovyle became Ash`s Frogadier rival after that battle as the two locked eyes in anticipation of their rematch battle.

character.name: Peroream (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Slurpuff was revealed when it was sent out to find Sawyer lost battle notebook. Peroream`s sense of smell is said to be a 100 million times better than a human`s so it was used to sniff out where the battle notebook was located. It quickly found it and took it away from Rocket Gang. Later on in the day, it faced Ash`s Hawlucha in a battle. It had Electro Ball prepared for dealing with Flying types but Ash`s Hawlucha dodged the attack and while trying to figure out what to do next, Ash`s Hawlucha knocked out Sawyer`s Slurpuff with Flying Press.

character.name: Onbat (Satoshi)
character.description: While training in a forest near Hyakkoku City, Ash`s Hawlucha found an egg which he brought to Ash Ketchum. He decided to go back to where it was found to see if there was a nest but by the time he got there, the egg started to hatch. Ash`s Fletchinder was instrumental in helping the egg hatch as it has an Ability called "Flame Body" that makes eggs hatch faster. Ash Ketchum and his friends didn`t know what kind of Pokémon egg it was until Noibat hatched. Noibat cries by using the move Supersonic which is quite deafening and it won`t stop until Ash Ketchum pets it as it thinks he`s its parent. Its favorite food is fruit and it can tell the ripeness of a fruit. Ash`s Hawlucha and Ash`s Fletchinder helped it learn to fly by teaching it first how to glide on the wind. After an encounter with Rocket Gang in which Ash`s Hawlucha protected Noibat it returned to Ash Ketchum and he asked Noibat if it wanted to travel with him and it agreed.

character.name: Frank
character.description: Frank is a movie director that specializes in Pikachu based movies. He has been together with Pikachu his whole life, so he can`t tell stories while leaving out Pikachu. During his childhood, he was sick a lot, but Pikachu always cheered him up. When he cried, Pikachu were by his side. When he was about Ash Ketchum`s age, he traveled together with his Pikachu. His Pikachu where also there when he got married and when his wife died. His Pikachu have always given him many smiles and that`s why he makes movies, so he can give children all over the world the ability to smile.

character.name: Jean
character.description: Jean is Frank`s granddaughter. She helps him produce his Pikachu movies as she wants to make her grandpa`s wish come true. She is often seen running the camera.

character.name: Oiseau
character.description: Oiseau is an old man that is a fan of the Pokémon Sky Relay. His dream is to win the Sky Relay and he asked Ash Ketchum if he could work with him to attain victory together to which he agreed. He has never actually personally participated in a relay as he was never able to get three Pokémon that could fly. Whenever he sees a promising Trainer, he supports them though. As he had watched many relay`s in the past, Oiseau was very familiar with the course. He knew all the intricacies and explained where they needed to look out for obstacles. He gave Ash Ketchum and his Pokémon a crash course the night before the race. He was very instrumental in setting up the strategy for the race by recommending Ash`s Fletchinder charge at full speed right at the beginning to be extremely effective in getting ahead of the pack because in the back there are many Pokémon, making it dangerous there. He explained that the third segment is comparatively easy to the first two segments as its almost completely straight. Ash`s Noibat was recommended to fly that segment. He did notify them though that the valley has a steep drop-off where there are sudden gusts of wind sometimes. Despite getting second in the race with Ash Ketchum and his Pokémon, he had seen the wonderful dream of winning and was grateful and moved.

character.name: Yorunozuku (Oiseau)
character.description: Oiseau`s Noctowl is Oiseau partner who watches Pokémon Sky Relay`s with him. Bonnie noted that Oiseau`s Noctowl looked like Oiseau. Unfortunately it cannot participate in the relay`s as Oiseau does not have enough flying Pokémon to make a team. None of its moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Ornis
character.description: Ornis is a two-time champion of the Kalos Region Pokémon Sky Relay. The day before the race in which Ash Ketchum participated in, Ornis made some good adjustments to his team and noted they were in top condition. He barely won the relay for the second straight year though.

character.name: Mukuhawk (Ornis)
character.description: Ornis`s Staraptor is part of a team that participates in the Pokémon Sky Relay. It flew the middle segment of the race and it wasn`t fast enough to to shorten the distance to Meowth Pelipper. After Meowth Pelipper was eliminated from the competition, it reached the 2nd checkpoint in second place. None of is moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Mukubird (Ornis)
character.description: Ornis`s Staravia part of a team that participates in the Pokémon Sky Relay. It flew the first segment of the race but was in the middle of the pack when it arrived at the first checkpoint but close enough for Ornis`s Staraptor to make a move in the next segment. None of is moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Mukkuru (Ornis)
character.description: Ornis`s Starly part of a team that participates in the Pokémon Sky Relay. It flew the final segment of the race and was able to just barely beat Ash`s Noibat to win the race. None of is moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Purin (Monarque)
character.description: Monarque`s Jigglypuff is one of the judges of the Tripokalon Pofflé segment. According to Meowth who did an interview, Monarque`s Jigglypuff is said to like sweet things. None of its moves are known.

character.name: Nyaonix (Millefeui)
character.description: Miette`s Meowstic was revealed just before entering the Tripokalon in Fujo Town. It is unknown how long that Miette has had it for. During the Pofflé round, it helped make the Pofflés by stirring the batter and was in sync with Miette to showcase their miracle cooking. It advanced to the second round as the judges enjoyed the Pofflés. It also performed in the second round with Miette`s Slurpuff but they ended up loosing the Tripokalon to Serena.

character.name: Salt
character.description: Salt is a Tripokalon judge and Pokémon Sommelier. He was a judge at the Tripokalon in Fujo Town for the Pofflé round. He diplomatically thought Jessie`s Pofflés were quite a novel decoration while he thought Serena`s Pofflés colors, shapes and scents were just wonderful.

character.name: Manene (Salt)
character.description: Salt`s Mime Jr. is one of the judges of the Tripokalon Pofflé segment. According to Meowth who did an interview, Salt`s Mime Jr. is said to like likes spicy stuff, Jessie used Matoma Berries for a topping on her Pofflés. None of its moves are known.

character.name: Decanter
character.description: Decanter is a Tripokalon judge and Pokémon Critic. She was a judge at the Tripokalon in Fujo Town for the Pofflé round. She thought Miette`s Pofflés had such a rich aroma and were wonderful. Decanter was quick to point out that despite Jessie`s Pofflés artistic design, the taste was well received by the Pokémon.

character.name: Trimmien (Decanter)
character.description: Decanter`s Furfrou is one of the judges of the Tripokalon Pofflé segment. According to Meowth who did an interview, Decanter`s Furfrou is said to like pleasant scents. None of its moves are known.

character.name: Yolton
character.description: Yolton is a hotel owner of a fine hotel located near Hyakokku City in the Kalos region. In an alternate timeline, on the opening day of his hotel, he was challenged to a Pokémon battle in which his Rotom fled the battlefield and he lost the battle. He made a deal with Mantle that if he lost the battle, he would give up his hotels ownership, which he ended up doing. He then became the hotel receptionist under Mantle. Ash Ketchum and his friends travel back in time 10 years with the help of Yolton`s Rotom. They changed the past and created a new alternate future where Yolton was able to defeat Mantle in the battle and keep the ownership of the hotel. He then hired Mantle to work at his hotel.

character.name: Mantle
character.description: Mantle is a hotel worker at Yolton hotel located in the Kalos region. He was unemployed and running wild 10 years in the past from the day Ash Ketchum and friends visited the hotel. He was the owner of the hotel as he won a Pokémon battle in the past against Yolton. He made a deal with Yolton that if he lost the battle he`d stop bugging him and his customers but in return, Yolton would give up his hotels ownership, which he ended up doing. Yolton then became the hotel receptionist under Mantle. Ash Ketchum and his friends travel back in time 10 years with the help of Yolton`s Rotom. They changed the past and created a new alternate future where Yolton was able to defeat Mantle in the battle and keep the ownership of the hotel. He then hired Mantle to work at his hotel.

character.name: Waruvial (Mantle)
character.description: Mantle`s Krookodile is an extremely strong Pokémon that originally scared Yolton`s Rotom from the battlefield and therefore Mantle won ownership of the hotel. In the alternate past, Ash Ketchum and his friends helped Yolton`s Rotom with a Forme changing strategy in order to overcome its normal weakness against Mantle`s Krookodile. It proved to be a super effective strategy and Yolton`s Rotom was able to defeat Mantle`s Krookodile so that Yolton could retain ownership of the hotel.

character.name: Rotom (Yolton)
character.description: Yolton`s Rotom lives at a fine hotel located near Hyakokku City in the Kalos region with its owner Yolton. It originally lost a battle against Mantle`s Krookodile because it was afraid and lost the battle. As a result of that loss, Yolton had to transfer ownership of the hotel to Mantle. In the 10 years since that battle, Yolton`s Rotom had time to think of what happened that day. Ash Ketchum and his friends travel back in time 10 years with the help of Yolton`s Rotom. It has some kind of special power that allows it to time travel and also allow others to time travel with it. The strategy in the rematch battle in the past was a Forme changing strategy in order for Yolton`s Rotom to overcome its normal weakness against Mantle`s Krookodile. It proved to be a super effective strategy and Yolton`s Rotom was able to defeat Mantle`s Krookodile so that Yolton could retain ownership of the hotel. In the present, Rotom spotted Ash Ketchum and his friends at the gathering for the tenth anniversary deluxe party for the hotel. It then showed them a picture that was taken 10 years earlier at the opening of the hotel to confirm to them that they had indeed traveled in time and it wasn`t just a dream.

character.name: Pump
character.description: Count Pump is the master of a castle in the Kalos region. He is fat and his appearance resembles a Pumpkaboo. The prince had fallen in love at first sight with Jessie`s Pumpkaboo and ordered his butler to invite them to the castle to be introduced and to have a meal. Upon meeting them, Pump noticed that Jessie`s Pumpkaboo was a truly excellent Bakeccha and that he`d never seen such a big one before. He then asked Jessie to trade her Bakeccha so that the prince could wed her. Despite initial hesitation, Jessie agreed and traded her Bakeccha for his Kucheat because he told her that it is a Pokémon reported to mega evolve. During the trade process, Jessie`s Pumpkaboo evolved into Jessie`s Gourgeist. Pump then realized that Pumpjin is a trade evolution and the prince liked the way Bakeccha looked better. After Rocket Gang reveal themselves as the true villians, Pump apologized to Clemont and friends for erroneously attempting to take Pikachu and Clemont`s Chespin who was dressed up as a Pikachu for the festival. He then invited them to a meal at the castle to make it up to them.

character.name: Kucheat (Pump)
character.description: Jessie was asked to trade Jessie`s Pumpkaboo so that the prince could wed her. Despite initial hesitation, Jessie agreed and traded her Bakeccha for Pump`s Kucheat because he told her that it is a Pokémon reported to mega evolve. During the trade process, Jessie`s Pumpkaboo evolved into Jessie`s Gourgeist. Pump then realized that Pumpjin is a trade evolution and the prince liked the way Bakeccha looked better so the trade was nullified and Pump`s Mawile stayed in his possession.

character.name: Pumpjin (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie`s Gourgeist was first revealed in the Movie 18 short poster and then later appeared in the third XY ending. Jessie`s Gourgeist is the evolved form of Jessie`s Pumpkaboo. Count Pump, the master of a castle in the Kalos region had been searching for a mate for his prince. The prince had fallen in love at first sight with Jessie`s Pumpkaboo and Pump, ordered his butler to invite them to the castle to be introduced and to have a meal. Upon meeting them, Pump noticed that Jessie`s Pumpkaboo was a truly excellent Bakeccha and that he`d never seen such a big one before. He then asked Jessie to trade her Bakeccha so that the prince could wed her. Despite initial hesitation, Jessie agreed and traded her Bakeccha for his Kucheat because he told her that it is a Pokémon reported to mega evolve. During the trade process, Jessie`s Pumpkaboo evolved into Jessie`s Gourgeist. Pump then realized that Pumpjin is a trade evolution and the prince liked the way Bakeccha looked better. Jessie then realized that the bond between Pokémon and Trainer was strong between those two as she remember that it nursed her the whole night when she had a fever, fed her with ground fruit and was the only one to congratulate her on her birthday when everyone else forgot.

character.name: Bakeccha (Pump)
character.description: Pump`s Pumpkaboo is the prince of a castle in the Kalos region. The prince had fallen in love at first sight with Jessie`s Pumpkaboo and Pump ordered his butler to invite them to the castle to be introduced and to have a meal. Upon meeting them, Pump noticed that Jessie`s Pumpkaboo was a truly excellent Bakeccha and that he`d never seen such a big one before. Pump`s Pumpkaboo though was a lot smaller than Jessie`s Pumpkaboo. Pump then asked Jessie to trade her Bakeccha so that the prince could wed her. Despite initial hesitation, Jessie agreed and traded her Bakeccha. During the trade process, Jessie`s Pumpkaboo evolved into Jessie`s Gourgeist. Pump then realized that Pumpjin is a trade evolution and the prince liked the way Bakeccha looked better and no longer wished to get married.

character.name: Jingoro
character.description: Master Jingoro, the great wood doctor, lives near Hyakkoku City. He is known for his expertise in wood graphing and an article was written about him in a local paper managing to reattach a Mebukijika`s horn perfectly. Nurse Joy suggested to Serena that she visit him in order to get Serena`s Braixen`s twig fixed. Initially Jingoro insinuated to Serena that if her and Braizen`s feelings were strong enough, he`d be able to put 100 percent of his effort into fixing the twig and the way to show that was to have a Pokémon battle with him as he believes they are the best way to know a Pokémon`s feelings. After the battle, he revealed that by the time she had brought the stick to him, it was already beyond saving. He believed that Serena`s Braixen already knew the reason why he had her battle. he explained that it`s important to cherish tools, but as with anything, being too choicy about them is not a good thing. When Serena`s Braixen tried using Flamethrower with its broken stick, it turned into Fire Blast. It may have been coincidental, but it was Serena`s Braixen strong feelings that made Fire Blast launch from that broken stick. He finished off by saying that if it had feelings as strong as what he`d seen in the battle, he was certain that it could master any kind of tool.

character.name: Ellade (Jingoro)
character.description: Jingoro`s Gallade resides with Jingoro near Hyakkoku City where it helps him mend wood. It spends time outside watering plants and wood graphs for him. It battled against Serena`s Braixen but it had a severe type disadvantage. The battle was only to teach Serena and Serena`s Braixen about their feeling for each other and that in the long run the twig that was broken wasn`t that important. Jingoro`s Gallade seemly lost the battle after it was stopped when Serena`s Braixen hit it with a direct hit from Fire Blast.

character.name: Fiarrow (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Talonflame is the evolved form of Ash`s Fletchinder. It evolved during a battle against Moltres at Mount Ardor. An attack was heading towards Ash Ketchum and the others and in a burst of adrenaline to go protect them, it also triggered it to evolve.

character.name: Lizardo (Trova)
character.description: Trevor`s Charmeleon is the evolved form of Trevor`s Charmander. It evolved sometime after the Summer Camp and it was instrumental in helping Trevor defeat Viola to get the Bug Badge. It`s personality did not change as a result of evolving into Charmeleon. Ash Ketchum and friends hear it in the bushes and he realized that it was in a battling mood so he asked Trevor to battle. Ash`s Fletchinder was sent out to battle it to help cool down its temperament at the time. The two traded blows until Ash`s Fletchinder was able to finish it off with a powerful Steel Wing. Despite loosing the battle, Trevor`s Charmeleon felt refreshed after the battle.

character.name: Eievui (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Eevee is a very Timid Pokémon that is shy to be in front of people and other Pokémon. Serena first saw it dancing on some rocks in a field near Hyakkoku City. She thought it was very cute and that it was light on its feet and it seemed to be having fun. It was very shy, so she lured it by putting out Pofflés that she made and then did her Tripokalon performance to show Eievui her feelings. Jessie also took a liking to it and also tried to get it by force though. She thought it had exceptional talent that would add grace to her magnificent performances. Serena and her Pokémon protected it for a bit but when Jessie`s Gourgeist used Seed Bomb on Serena, Eevee came to the rescue and used Protect to stop her from being harmed. After being saved by Eievui, Serena asked it again if it would join her on her journey and it agreed. She captured it with her Poké Ball and then let it out to meet all the other Pokémon. It seemed to like Clemont`s Bunnelby but Clemont`s Chespin got a bit upset when it didn`t initially like it.

character.name: Fushigisou (Sana)
character.description: Shauna`s Ivysaur is the evolved form of Shauna`s Bulbasaur. It evolved sometime after the Hiyoku Tripokalon Tournament. To help Serena`s Eevee overcome its shyness and to learn how to battle, Shauna`s Ivysaur teamed up with it in a tag battle against Ash and Tierno. The battle was cut short though as Serena got an idea for a new performance and wanted to practice it immediately.

character.name: Kamex (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Blastoise is the evolved form of Tierno`s Wartortle. It evolved sometime after the training session with Ash when it got captured by Team Rocket. Since that time, Tierno and Tierno`s Wartortle had been improving their dancing and battling, which caused it to evolve. To help Serena`s Eevee overcome its shyness and to learn how to battle, Tierno`s Blastoise teamed up with Pikachu in a tag battle against Shauna`s Ivysaur and Serena`s Eevee. The battle was cut short though as Serena got an idea for a new performance and wanted to practice it immediately. Tierno`s Blastoise and Pikachu then had a battle but only the start of it was shown in the episode.

character.name: Lily
character.description: Lily is a Tripokalon Performer who participated in the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament in the Kalos region. She was eliminated in the first quiz question round when she was matched up against Serena.

character.name: Solrock (Lily)
character.description: Lily`s Solrock is a Tripokalon Performer who participated in the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament in the Kalos region. It was eliminated in the first quiz question round when it was matched up against Serena`s Pancham and Nene`s Farfetch`d and was unable to return the ball back to Lily in time to answer any of the quiz questions.

character.name: Carrie
character.description: Carrie is one of the gym trainers in the Anistar Gym and also one of Olympia`s higher trained students alongside Sheryl. The Forewarning Carrie was first seen observing Olympia`s vision about the future of the Kalos region and having been unsettled about the prediction, she rushes off before Olympia can explain what it meant. As Professor Sycamore arrived at the Anistar Sundial, she hastily asked him what he was up to and begun to attack them with her Sigilyph, destroying their research equipment. Ash vs Carrie When Ash and the rest of the group arrived to see what was going on, she was shocked at his arival and sent out her Sableye to attack them with Power Gem. She was then involved in a double battle with Ash and was easily defeated. Once defeated, she attempted to send out a third, unknown Pokémon however she was stopped by Olympia`s Meowstic, who gave the PokéBall to Olympia. She was then reprimanded for her actions and was made to apologize to both Sycamore and Ash for the trouble she caused.

character.name: Symboler (Carrie)
character.description: Due to an earlier misunderstanding of Olympia`s vision, Carrie`s Sigilyph was first used to attack Professor Sycamore, Cosette and Sophie upon arrival to the Anistar Sundial. It was then used in a double battle alongside Carrie`s Sableye where it took on Ash`s Frogadier and Pikachu. Having dodged Pikachu`s Electro Ball it used Psywave in return, however it was eventually defeated by Pikachu`s Thunderbolt.

character.name: Yamirami (Carrie)
character.description: Carrie`s Sableye was sent out to attack Ash after Carrie was shocked of his arrival so soon after Professor Sycamore`s. She commanded it to use Power Gem on them, to which they evaded. It was then used alongside Carrie`s Sigilyph in a double battle against Ash`s Frogadier and Pikachu, where it took damage from Froagadier`s Water Pulse, however it fought back using Shadow Claw which dealt damage to Frogadier. After Carrie`s Sigilyph was deafeated and recalled, it was then told to use Power Gem, however Frogadier cancelled it out with Water Pulse. It was eventually defeated by Frogadier`s Aerial Ace.

character.name: Pachira
character.description: Malva is the Holo Caster news reporter and is also a member of the Kalos Elite Four. While at the Hyakkoku City Pokémon Center, Ash and his friends heard a broadcast with Mega Evolution-related news. She announced that Professor Sycamore would be visiting the sundial that day to conduct an investigation. She explained that according to one theory, the sundial came from space and that it is still shrouded in mysteries, but recent studies had revealed a deep connection to Mega Stones. His conclusions based on the investigation of the sundial were reported by her as being highly anticipated.

character.name: Sheryl
character.description: Sheryl is a Psychic-type Pokémon Trainer who is also Olympia`s apprentice. She scolded Carrie for acting out on her own arbitrary interpretations of the future Olympia saw in regards to Ash and Professor Sycamore. She humbly begged for their pardon for their rude actions. Sheryl explained that Olympia learns about the future by being guided by the voice of the stars. The incident off the coast of Houen was also allowed he to predict the incident with Groudon and Kyogre beforehand. Even though the world suffered from abnormal weather, her prediction enabled people in the Kalos region to take all possible countermeasures, so nothing serious happened.

character.name: Gojika
character.description: Olympia is the Gym Leader of the Anistar Gym and she awards trainers that defeat her the Psychic Badge. She is a strong Psychic who can see the past and the future through the use of Future Sight. Sheryl explained that Olympia learns about the future by being guided by the voice of the stars. The incident off the coast of Houen was also allowed he to predict the incident with Groudon and Kyogre beforehand. Even though the world suffered from abnormal weather, her prediction enabled people in the Kalos region to take all possible countermeasures, so nothing serious happened.

character.name: Nyaonix (Gojika)
character.description: Olympia`s Meowstic is one of the two Meowstic that Olympia has as her main partners. It battled against Ash`s Talonflame and Ash`s Frogadier in a double battle gym fight. Its Ability is Prankster which allows it to preemptively activate supporting moves such as Light Screen. That`s why it could protect the female before the attack from Ash and his Pokémon could hit.

character.name: Nyaonix (Gojika)
character.description: Olympia`s Meowstic is one of the two Meowstic that Olympia has as her main partners. It battled against Ash`s Talonflame and Ash`s Frogadier in a double battle gym fight. Its Ability is Keen Eye which makes it extremely difficult for opponents to evade moves.

character.name: Cal
character.description: Cal is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to become the Kalos Queen. Her name was first confirmed in the Japanese closed captions of XYZ 16 but she had appeared in previous tournaments before participating in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She lost the round due to Serena`s experience with Sihorn and was therefore eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Zuruggu (Cal)
character.description: Cal`s Scraggy is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to help Cal become the Kalos Queen. It participated in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It lost the round and was therefore eliminated from the tournament due to the fact it wasn`t able to attract enough of the Sihorn and Serena`s experience with Sihorn gave her a bit of an advantage.
